job.title: Machine Learning / Signal Processing Engineer (Fully Remote)
job.description: pstrongWho We ArestrongppbrppAmberBox is the industry leader in gunshot detection and response technology We help Fortune 100 corporations schools hospitals government departments and airports protect their staff and visitors from the threat of workplace violence automating the emergency response process in an incident AmberBox is a Silicon Valley VCbacked rapidly scaling company and we are looking for individuals that share our vision and experimentative approachppbrppbrppstrongAbout The JobstrongppbrppAs a Machine Learning  Signal Processing Engineer you will be responsible for researching and developing algorithms capable of accurately detecting gunshots from audio and visual queues This is an important part of how we detect and respond to emergency incidentsppbrppstrongSkillsexperiencenbspstrongppbrpp Signal processing background familiar with FFTs DFTs and DTFTs also FIR and IIR filterspp Neural Network experience DNN CNN RNNnbsppp Pythonpp Must have an appetite for live testing the systemppbrppstrongNice to havenbspstrongppbrpp Speech recognition experiencepp CCpp Experience working withbuilding Linuxpp Statistical pattern processing background Wiener filters Support Vector Machinesp
